scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production bankai start -j [ -g yo-yoify ] -c [ -u sheetify-sass -u sheetify-cssnext ] index.js -p 80
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development bankai start -j [ -g yo-yoify ] -c [ -u sheetify-sass -u sheetify-cssnext ] index.js -p 8080
scripts.build: bankai build -j [ -g yo-yoify ] -c [ -u sheetify-sass -u sheetify-cssnext ] index.js
scripts.test-deps: dependency-check . -i sheetify && dependency-check . --extra --no-dev -i sanitize.css -i sheetify-sass -i sheetify-cssnext -i yo-yoify
